name: travel-booking-platform
description: A comprehensive travel booking platform with flight, hotel, car rental, and restaurant suggestions

scripts.dev:local: concurrently "PORT=5050 npm run dev:backend" "REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5050/api npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
